entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 10:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
